description: Detects suspicious shell spawn from Java utility keytool process (e.g. adselfservice plus exploitation)
name: Suspicious Shells Spawn by Java Utility Keytool
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\keytool.exe AND process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\sh.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\schtasks.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\whoami.exe OR *\\bitsadmin.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\scrcons.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\hh.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\forfiles.exe OR *\\scriptrunner.exe OR *\\mftrace.exe OR *\\AppVLP.exe))
author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
